name: ▽​FUSE
description:
▽FUSE Is a Puzzle Platformer Game Inspired on Sci-Fi enviroments and Very Dark Music.   

Jump, Dash and use your precision skills to break the FUSE. 

Some glitches are allowed.

Install Intructions:

  • Download .rar file
  • Place on you desktop
  • Right click > Extract here
  • Double click on VFUSE.exe
  • Pick ULTRA Graphics
  • Enjoy & Please use Double Jump!
